article.headline: Fordham 70, Sacred Heart 68
article.story: NEW YORK (AP) -- Chris Bethel scored 15 points, including the go-ahead free throws with 2:12 to play, and Fordham beat Sacred Heart 70-68 on Friday night. Brenton Butler and Bryant Dunston each followed with 14 points for the Rams (1-0), who held a 34-29 lead at halftime. Jarrid Frye and Ryon Howard scored 14 points apiece for the Pioneers (0-1). Frye's two free throws with 2:29 to play tied it at 64. Bethel answered with two free throws to put Fordham back on top, Dunston made two free throws and Kevin Anderson had one to build the lead to 69-64 with 1:06 left. Chauncey Hardy had a layup with 9.1 to play to get Sacred Heart within 69-68 before Dunston made the first free throw with 8.6 seconds to go. Marcus Stout missed the front end with 0.8 seconds left and Tavio Hobson got the rebound but then turned it over to end the game.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
